Key Match Events: LeBron James responded with consecutive 3s to put the Lakers up 101-97 with 37 seconds left after Brandon Ingram gave the Pelicans a late two-point lead
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Lakers outscored the Pelicans in the paint, 52-40
Others: Rookie Dalton Knecht hit five 3s to finish with a career-high 27 points in a spot start for the Lakers
The Pelicans led 56-46 at halftime but couldn't quite get the win
Cam Reddish (lower right leg) did not play after leaving Friday night's game in San Antonio earlier than usual
